verse.title: WhenGoingToTheMosque1
verse.text: {ll~ahum~a {joEalo fiY qalobiy nuwrFA\, wafiY lisaAniy nuwrFA\, wafiY samoEiy nuwrFA\, wafiY baSariy nuwrFA\, wamin fawoqiy nuwrFA\, wamin taHotiy nuwrFA\, waEan yamiyniy nuwrFA\, waEan $imaAliy nuwrFA\, wamino >amaAmiy nuwrFA\, wamino xalofiY nuwrFA\, waAjoEalo fiY nafosiy nuwrFA\, wa>aEoZimo liy nuwrFA\, waEaZ~imo liy nuwrFA\, waAjoEalo liy nuwrFA\, waAjoEaloniy nuwrFA\, {ll~ahum~a >aEoTiniy nuwrFA\, waAjoEalo fiY EaSabiy nuwrFA\, wafiY laHomiy nuwrFA\, wafiY damiy nuwrFA\, wafiY $aEoriy nuwrFA\, wafiY ba$ariy nuwrFA ({ll~ahum~a {joEalo liy nuwrFA fiY qaboriy\. wanuwrFA fiY EiZaAmiy) (wazidoniy nuwrFA\, wazidoniy nuwrFA\, wazidoniy nuwrFA) (wahabo liy nuwrFA EalaY nuwrK) \{reference:Al-Bukhari 11/116 (Hadith no. 6316) and by Muslim 1/526,529-530 (Hadith no. 763). Al-Tirmidhi 5/483 (Hadith no. 3419). Al-Bukhari in Al-Adab Al-Mufrad (Hadith no. 695), p. 258. See also Al-Albani, Sahih Al-Adab Al-Mufrad (no. 536), Al-Bukhari, cf. Al-Asqalani, Fathul-Bari 11/118.\}

verse.title: InTheEvening1
verse.text: >amosayonaA wa>amosaY {lomuloku lil~ahi wa{loHamodu lil~ahi\, laA^ <ilaha <il~aA {ll~ahu waHodahu laA $ariyka lahu\, lahu {lomuloku walahu {loHamodu wahuwa EalaY kul~i $ayo'K qadiyrN\, rab~i >aso>aluka xayora maA fiY ha`*ihi {l~ayolapi waxayora maA baEodahaA\, wa>aEuw*u bika min $ar~i maA fiY ha`*ihi {l~ayolapi wa$ar~i maA baEodahaA\, rab~i >aEuw*u bika mina {lokasali\, wasuw^'i {lokibari\, rab~i >aEuw*u bika mino Ea*aAbK fiY {ln~aAri waEa*aAbK fiY {loqabori\.

verse.title: InTheEvening2
verse.text: {ll~ahum~a bika >amosayonaA\, wabika >aSobaHonaA\, wabika naHoyaA\, wabika namuwtu wa<ilayoka {lomaSiyru\.

verse.title: InTheEvening3
verse.text: {ll~ahum~a <in~iY^ >amosayotu >u$ohiduka wa>u$ohidu Hamalapa Earo$ika\, wamala`^}ikataka wajamiyEa xaloqika\, >an~aka >anta {ll~ahu laA^ <ilaha <il~aA^ >anta waHodaka laA $ariyka laka\, wa>an~a muHam~dFA Eaboduka warasuwluka (>arobaEFA mar~aAtFA Hiyna)

verse.title: InTheEvening4
verse.text: {ll~ahum~a maA^ >amosaA biy mino niEomapK >awo bi>aHadK mino xaloqika faminka waHodaka laA $ariyka laka\, falaka {loHamodu walaka {l$~ukoru\.

verse.title: InTheEvening5
verse.text: >amosayonaA wa>amosiY {lomuloku lil~ahi rab~i {loEaAlamiyna\, {ll~ahum~a <in~iY^ >aso>aluka xayora ha`*ihi {l~ayolapi\: fatoHahaA\, wanaSorahaA wanuwrahaA\, wabarakatahaA\, wahudaAhaA\, wa>aEuw*u bika min $ar~i maA fiyhaA wa$ar~i maA baEodahaA\.
